= XML-RPC API to Seattle GENI =

[[BR]]

=== acquire_resources(num, type) ===
----

Acquires num resources of type. Returns a list of nodeip:nmport:vesselid strings indicating which vessels were acquired.

[[BR]]
=== release_resources(which) ===
----

Release resources associated with an account. If which is an empty list then it release all resources associated with an account.

=== get_resource_info() ===
----

Returns a list resources currently associated with this account.

[[BR]]
=== get_account_info() ===
----

Returns a list of account information for the account. This includes the user's keys, port number, name, and affiliation.
